clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Guanxin Shutong Capsule to Treat Chronic Stable Angina
clinical_study.official_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of Guanxin Shutong Capsule to Treat Chronic Stable Angina: A Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Compared with placebo, assess of the efficacy and safety of Guanxin Shutong capsule to treat chronic stable angina (syndrome of blood stasis resistance), and the result will be used for the basis of later Ⅳ clinical trial.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Therapeutic effect to Angina ( Average value of angina frequency)
primary_outcome.description: Record angina frequency per week. Record date is Start-up Stage 1st week, Start-up Stage 2st week, Interview Stage 1st week, Interview Stage 2st week, Interview Stage 3st week and Interview Stage 4st week (Toal of 6 times).
ST-segment displacement in electrocardiogram: Observe ST-segment displacement of J point after 60ms, including the degree of ST-segment depression.

secondary_outcome.measure: Usage of nitroglycerine per day (average value)
Scores on Chinese medical syndrome scale
secondary_outcome.description: Primary symptom: Chest pains (0; Slight: 2; Moderate: 4; Severe: 6) Chest congestion (0; Slight: 2; Moderate: 4; Severe: 6) Secondary symptom: Palpitation (0; Slight: 1; Moderate: 2; Severe: 3) Shortness of breath (0; Slight: 1; Moderate: 2; Severe: 3) Insomnia (0; Slight: 1; Moderate: 2; Severe: 3)
Compare the changes of electrocardiogram manifestation (such as ST segment, T wave) of angina before and after treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of angina break out from exercise beginning in ETT
Time of ST below 1 mm from exercise beginning in ETT

other_outcome.measure: Degree and duration of angina attack.

arm_group.description: 3 capsules once, tid, Oral Duration: 4 weeks
Placebo capsule and Guanxin Shutong Capsule the same appearance are made by SHAANXI BUCHANG PHARMACEUTICAL CO.,LTD. 3 capsules once, tid, Oral Duration: 4 weeks

intervention.description: 3 capsules three times a day; Duration: 4 weeks. Number of Cycles: until progression or unacceptable toxicity develops.
3 capsules three times a day; Duration: 4 weeks.

Adults: 0.25mg-0.5mg (half pill or 1 pill) once, sub-lingual. One more pill per 5 minutes untill pain relief. If total dose is 3 pills in 15 minutes and the pain is still in, please seek medical advice urgently. The participators in both arms who have agina symptom will take Nitroglycerine. So the accumulated consumption of participators is the one of the maesuremnts.
